channel.title: Shop value?
channel.description:
I am running Bulby 508 Source. I went and added shops and you can buy from them and it takes the money it costs, but when i hit "value" nothing shows up. How do i make it so when you click on the item or click on value it says "This item currently costs ####"
replace numbers with cost of item

item.title: Shop value?
item.dc:creator: @adecker adecker
item.description:
